snippet: The rise in China’s military spending comes amid an intensifying strategic rivalry between the United States and China in Asia and concerns in Washington.
abstract: China announces an 11.2 percent increase in military spending; rise comes amid intensifying strategic rivalry between the United States and China in Asia and concerns in Washington about the secrecy surrounding the Chinese defense budget.
lead_paragraph: The rise in China’s military spending comes amid an intensifying strategic rivalry between the United States and China in Asia and concerns in Washington.

headline.seo: China Increases Military Spending More Than 11 Percent
headline.main: Continuing Buildup, China Boosts Military Spending More Than 11 Percent
headline.print_headline: Continuing Buildup, China Increases Military Spending More Than 11 Percent
